page.title: 18SCHOOLDAYS 1985.
page.content: We have 12 teachers at Swillington School, including headmaster. There are 9 classes, 5 junior and 4 infant. We don't have any particular uniform but we are not allowed to wear make-up, very high heeled shoes or dangly earings. We seem to have quite alot of rules, but the teachers assure us that we don't. Here are a few:- 1.Don't run in class or down the corridor. 2.Don't eat in the classroom. 3.Don't go out of school grounds in school time. 4.Don't go in the classroom when a teacher isn't there. School on the whole is quite enjoyable. Drama is the most favoured lesson in my class. We usually do concerts at the end of the year for parents. Sometimes we put plays on at Christmas. We can't put an end of term play on this year because of the teachers' dispute.
